# tear ⇔ drag traction

𓄜 Tail Teil (separate)
𓄛 Tier tear (𓃮parat)
𒁯 dar tear : break up, crush, grind; to split, split up; to cut open 𒋻 TAR tear trennen separate, cut off
𒋻 tar tear ≈ zerr zieh zuck in 𒆆 zukura "tear off"

𒂊𒋼𒊒 ᵍe-ṭe-ru getear ⇔ Güter
𒂊𒋼𒊒 save, to take away

𓇦 bind ⇔ 󳽚 󳽛 󳽜 󳽝 󳽞 󳽟 󳽠 󳽡 󳽢 󳽣 korb zerr tear
